alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Lincoln; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:25PM CDT until June 15 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Seminole County in east central Oklahoma... Southeastern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... Southeastern Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... Northeastern Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... Northern Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dale, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southeastern Oklahoma City, Shawnee, Tecumseh, McLoud, Prague, Pink, Meeker, Earlsboro, Johnson, Dale, Little, Newalla, Bethel Acres, Aydelotte, and Centerview. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
